docs.lead_paragraph: Palestinian gunmen shot dead an Israeli settler and wounded his pregnant wife on the West Bank today, as Israeli forces raided the northern Gaza Strip for a second day, bulldozing orchards and brush in a declared reprisal for Palestinian rocket fire. In the West Bank cities of Jenin and Nablus, Israeli troops continued house-to-house searches for weapons and for Palestinians accused of terrorism.

headline.main: Gunmen Kill Settler in West Bank as Israelis Raid Gaza

docs.abstract: Palestinian gunmen shoot Israeli settler dead and wound his pregnant wife northeast of Ramallah on West Bank; Al Aksa Martyrs Brigades claims responsibility; Israeli troops continue house-to-house searches in Jenin and Nablus on West Bank, seeking weapons and Palestinians accused of terrorism; Israel begins new campaign to kill Hamas militants and leaders in Gaza; photo (M)
docs.snippet: Palestinian gunmen shot dead an Israeli settler and wounded his pregnant wife on the West Bank today, as Israeli forces raided the northern Gaza Strip for a second day, bulldozing orchards and brush in a declared reprisal for Palestinian rocket fire....

docs.lead_paragraph: A front-page article yesterday about a City Opera production of ''Lucia di Lammermoor'' that incorporates into the plot the pregnancy of the soprano playing the title role misstated the relationship between Lucia and Arturo when she stabs him to death. He is her husband, not her betrothed.
docs.abstract: Correction of Aug 28 article on City Opera production of Lucia di Lammermoor, regarding plot
